events.message: I recently received my order but want to request a refund as the product does not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to their desire to return the product.
Assigning the case to a refund specialist to handle the customer's request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. I’m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging for the refund?
My order number is #12345678. The item is unopened and in its original box, ready to be returned as per your instructions.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label shortly, and once we receive the product, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the product.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to ship back the product and expect your refund after we process the return.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I got the label and have already sent the package. Thanks for the smooth support!
Your refund has been processed successfully. We’re closing the case now, and thank you for choosing our services.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your recent refund experience.
